Verses: 1 dhevanudaiya Oozhiyakkaaranum Yesukiristhuvinudaiya Apposthalanumaagiya Pavul, Podhuvaana Visuvaasaththinpadi Uththama Kumaaranaagiya Theeththuvukku Ezhudhugiradhaavadhu:
2 pidhaavaagiya Dhevanaalum, Nammudaiya Ratchagaraayirukkira Karththaraagiya Yesu Kiristhuvinaalum, Kirubaiyum Irakkamum Samaadhaanamum Undaavadhaaga.

3 poiyuraiyaadha Dhevan Aadhikaalamudhal Niththiya Jeevanaikkuriththu Vaakkuththaththampanni, Adhaikkuriththa Nambikkaiyaippatri Dhevabakthikkedhuvaana Saththiyaththai Arigira Arivum Visuvaasamum Dhevanaal Therindhukollappattavargalukku Undaagumpadi,
4 etrakaalangalile Nammudaiya Ratchagaraagiya Dhevanudaiya Kattalaiyinpadi Enakku Oppuvikkappatta Pirasangaththinaale Thamadhu Vaarththaiyai Velippaduththinaar.
5 nee Kuraivaayirukkiravaigalai Ozhungupaduththumpadikkum, Naan Unakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Pattanangaldhorum Moopparai Erpaduththumpadikkum, Unnaik Kireththaatheevile Vittuvandhene.

6 kutransaattappadaadhavanum, Ore Manaiviyaiyudaiya Purushanum, Dhunmaarkkarendrum Adangaadhavargalendrum Peredukkaadha Visuvaasamulla Pillaigalai Udaiyavanumaagiya Oruvanirundhaal Avanaiye Erpaduththalaam.

7 enenil, Kankaaniyaanavan Dhevanudaiya Ukkiraanakkaaranukketravidhamaai, Kutranchaattappadaadhavanum, Than Ishtappadi Seyyaadhavanum, Murkobamillaadhavanum, Madhubaanappiriyamillaadhavanum, Adiyaadhavanum, Izhivaana Aadhaayaththai Ichchiyaadhavanum,
8 anniyarai Ubasarikkiravanum, Nallormel Piriyamullavanum, Thelindhabuththiyullavanum, Needhimaanum, Parisuththavaanum, Ichchaiyadakkamullavanum,

9 aarokkiyamaana Ubadhesaththinaale Buththisollavum, Edhirpesugiravargalaik Kandanam Pannavum Vallavanumaayirukkumpadi, Thaan Bodhikkappattadharketra Unmaiyaana Vasanaththai Nandraaip Patrikkollugiravanumaayirukkavendum.
10 anegar, Viseshamaai Viruththasedhanamullavargal, Adangaadhavargalum, Veenpechchukkaararum, Manadhai Mayakkugiravargalumaayirukkiraargal.
11 avargaludaiya Vaayai Adakkavendum; Avargal Izhivaana Aadhaayaththukkaagath Thagaadhavaigalai Ubadhesiththu, Muzhukkudumbangalaiyum Kavizhththuppodugiraargal.
12 kireththaatheevaar Oyaappoiyar, Dhushtamirugangal, Peruvayitru Somberigal Endru Avargalil Oruvanaagiya Avargal Theerkkadharisiyaanavane Solliyirukkiraan.
13 indha Saatchi Unmaiyaayirukkiradhu; Idhu Mugaandharamaaga, Avargal Yoodharudaiya Kattukkadhaigalukkum, Saththiyaththai Vittu Vilagugira Manusharudaiya Karpanaigalukkum Sevikodaamal,
14 visuvaasaththile Aarokkiyamullavargalaayirukkumpadi, Nee Avargalaik Kandippaaik Kadindhukol.
15 suththamullavargalukku Sagalamum Suththamaayirukkum; Asuththamullavargalukkum Avisuvaasamullavargalukkum Ondrum Suththamaayiraadhu; Avargaludaiya Buththiyum Manasaatchiyum Asuththamaayirukkum.

16 avargal Dhevanai Arindhirukkiromendru Arikkaipannugiraargal, Kiriyaigalinaalo Avarai Marudhalikkiraargal; Avargal Aruvarukkappadaththakkavargalum, Keezhppadiyaadhavargalum, Endha Narkiriyaiyunseyya Aagaadhavargalumaayirukkiraargal.
